alert.note: Alert for Eastern Loudoun; Western Loudoun (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 2:28PM EST until January 09 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO NOON EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central, northeast and northern Maryland and northern Virginia. * WHEN...From 6 AM to noon EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
